title: Better Date Than Never
overview: Better Date Than Never is a character led six part docuseries following a diverse group of single love seekers as they take a huge step in anyone's life – into the dating world.Each participant has a unique story, and a different reason for a later start to their dating journey. They all share a common goal – to step out on their first date.With a little help from the producers, the participants launch themselves into a world they've always wanted to explore. They are matched with a potential suitor, and ready themselves to meet them on a blind date. We are with them as they experience the most important moment of their dating lives: the beginning.Participants stories are interwoven across the series as they set out on the sometimes rocky road to finding love. As their stories develop - connections will be made, hearts will break, love will blossom.Refreshingly real, honest and diverse, Better Date Than Never is a warm hearted series exploring the world of dating and relationships, from the creators of Love on the Spectrum.
